page.title: 12FASHION TODAY FOR ADULTS
page.content: Today the ladies fashion in hair is bobbed, permed, short, streaked and punk. Mens fashion in hair is punk, streaked, layered. Men's earrings in fashion are rings, dangly, and studs. Ladies earrings in fashion are dangly pearls, round, diamond, hearts, and flowers. In ladies shoes the fashions are mostly high heeled, we think these are the best, flat shoes for old people, pointed shoes for young people and slip-ons for middle age people. In Mens clothes mostly the fashion is jogging suits and jackets most of the men wear jeans and tee bag tops and most men wear suits for going out. In Ladies clothes the most popular fashions are flowery tops,shirts, blouses,trousers,sun-tops and skirts.
